attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the iscsiPortal instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the iscsiPortal instance.

attributes.name: ethernetPort
attributes.description: Ethernet port used by the iSCSI portal.

attributes.name: iscsiNode
attributes.description: iSCSI node used by the iSCSI portal.

attributes.name: ipAddress
attributes.description: IP address of the iSCSI portal.

attributes.name: netmask
attributes.description: IPv4 netmask for the network interface, if it uses an IPv4 address.

attributes.name: v6PrefixLength
attributes.description: IPv6 prefix length for the interface, if it uses an IPv6 address.

attributes.name: gateway
attributes.description: IPv4 or IPv6 gateway address for the network interface.

attributes.name: vlanId
attributes.description: Virtual Local Area Network (VLAN) identifier for the interface. The interface uses the identifier to accept packets that have matching VLAN tags. <p/> Values are 1 - 4094.

attributes.name: ipProtocolVersion
attributes.description: Indicates whether the iSCSI portal is over IPv4 or IPv6.

content.name: iscsiPortal
content.description: Information about the iSCSI portals in the storage system.
